import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
plt.figure(figsize=(16,5), dpi=100)
plt.plot(df.index,df.Number_of_Sales, color='tab:green')
plt.gca().set(title='Daily NFT Sales.', xlabel='Date', ylabel='NFT')
plt.show()
